Description.Text:
In a quiet area, a few minutes' walk from Camden High Street and the London Underground, these bright modern apartments feature lounge/dining rooms and fully equipped kitchens. The apartments at Regent's Park Residence have stylish furniture and big double-glazed windows. Most have a small balcony. Enjoy 22-inch (55 cm) flat-screen digital TV, with up to 48 TV channels, 24 radio stations and DVD players. Regent's Park Residence is within walking distance of Camden Lock (Camden Market) and Regent's Park, its outdoor Shakespeare theatre and London Zoo.
IMPORTANT CHECK IN INFORMATION:
The check-in takes place at our office: Ground Floor, 47 Kentish Town Road, Waterside House, London NW1 8NX Please call +44 203 5981 742 to schedule your check in 60 min before your arrival at the office.
During your check in you: a) fill in our guest form, b) facilitate the outstanding payment c) provide us with your credit card details OR leave a cash deposit of 150 GBP to cover any possible damage that might be incurred to the apartment or its contents during your stay. In case you choose to leave a deposit, it is refunded after check-out, once the apartment has been proved free of damage. d) only upon payment you receive the keys to your apartment. Groups of 6 or more will be charged a security deposit of 50 GBP per person.
Accepted payment methods: Preferred method of payment: CASH. VISA, Mastercard, Visa Electron are subject to a surcharge of 1.7%. Other cards are subject to a surcharge of 4.2% Amex or Maestro cards are not accepted. Please, bring a photocopy of a picture ID of the person in whose name the reservation was made, and of any person paying by credit card.

Regent's Park Residence is within walking distance of Camden Lock (Camden Market) and Regent's Park, its outdoor Shakespeare theatre and London Zoo. A 4-minute walk from Mornington Crescent Underground Station, with trains to the West End in 8 minutes. Easy access to London's National Gallery, British Museum, Trafalgar Square and Madame Tussauds. St. Pancras International Rail Station is an 8-minute walk away, with trains to Paris and other cities in Europe.

STUDIO APARTMENT - AMENITIES
Iron & Ironing Board, Hair Dryer, Bed Linen & Towels, Washing Machine, TV, internet connection, heating
BATHROOM
toilet, shower, washbasin , mirror
BEDROOM/LIVINGROOM
cupboard, double bed, lamp
LIVING ROOM WITH KITCHEN
Cookware & Kitchen Utensils, Crockery & Cutlery, TV, oven, electric kettle, toaster, plates, pans, fridge / freezer, table and chairs, sofabed, cupboards, Chair
APARTMENT - APARTMENT - Apartment- Apartment offers one double bed and one sofa bed. Room Facilities: Ironing Facilities, Seating Area, Washing Machine, Heating, Sofa, Hairdryer, Toilet, Bathroom, TV, DVD Player, Refrigerator, Microwave, Kitchen, Dining Area, Balcony Room Size: 44 square meters.
APARTMENT - APARTMENT - Apartment- Apartment offers one double bed, one twin bed and one sofa bedRoom Facilities: Ironing Facilities, Seating Area, Washing Machine, Heating, Sofa, Hairdryer, Toilet, Bathroom, TV, DVD Player, Refrigerator, Microwave, Kitchen, Dining Area, Balcony Room Size: 72 square meters.
APARTMENT - APARTMENT - Apartment- Apartment offers two double bed, one twin bed and one sofa bedRoom Facilities: Ironing Facilities, Seating Area, Washing Machine, Heating, Sofa, Hairdryer, Toilet, Bathroom, TV, DVD Player, Refrigerator, Microwave, Kitchen, Dining Area, Balcony Room Size: 85 square meters.
